00034 class KVIRC_API KviKvsTreeNodeData : public KviKvsTreeNode
00035 {
00036 public:
00037         KviKvsTreeNodeData(const QChar * pLocation);
00038         ~KviKvsTreeNodeData();
00039 protected:
00040         const QChar * m_pEndingLocation; // note that this MIGHT be not set (it's set for sure for anything parsed by parseCommaSeparatedParameter()
00041 public:
00042         void setEndingLocation(const QChar * pEndingLocation){ m_pEndingLocation = pEndingLocation; };
00043         const QChar * endingLocation(){ return m_pEndingLocation; };
00044 
00045         virtual bool evaluateReadOnly(KviKvsRunTimeContext * c,KviKvsVariant * pBuffer);
00046         virtual KviKvsRWEvaluationResult * evaluateReadWrite(KviKvsRunTimeContext * c); // error by default
00047 
00048         virtual bool evaluateReadOnlyInObjectScope(KviKvsObject * o,KviKvsRunTimeContext * c,KviKvsVariant * pBuffer); // error by default
00049         virtual KviKvsRWEvaluationResult * evaluateReadWriteInObjectScope(KviKvsObject * o,KviKvsRunTimeContext * c); // error by default
00050

00052         virtual void dump(const char * prefix);
00053

00055         virtual bool canEvaluateToObjectReference(); // no by default
00056         virtual bool isFunctionCall(); // no by default
00057         virtual bool canEvaluateInObjectScope(); // no by default
00058 
00059         virtual bool convertStringConstantToNumeric(); // this does nothing by default and is reimplemented only by KviKvsTreeNodeConstantData
